summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 DODGE JOURNEY. WHILE DRIVING LOW OR HIGH SPEEDS, THE STEERING BECAME DIFFICULT TO MANEUVER. ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS, THE CLOCK SET ITSELF AT DIFFERENT TIMES AND THE TIRE PRESSURE FLUCTUATED UP AND DOWN WITHOUT WARNING. THE DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE CONTACT REFERENCED NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V273000 (STEERING). THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 68,695.
